name: Blades of Doom
description:
Don't touch the saw blades or else you will be sad.

Controls

Desktop uses can press F4 or F11 for Fullscreen!

Press tab to disable glow.

Press Backspace to return to the menu.

Single Player KeyActionLeft - Right / A - D Move Space / Up / W / Shift / Ctr Jump

Gamepad is also supported

Multiplayer PlayerKeyActionPlayer 1 A - D Move Space / W JumpPlayer 2 Left - Right Move Up / Shift / Ctr Jump

(Player 2 will use single player keyboard controls if Player 1 uses a gamepad)

Ludum Dare

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51. It was my 3rd time participating.
